name: Release 1.0.0
body:
# Breaking Changes
- Changed `riseapi` mode response format ([#1585](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1585)).
- **Removed support for TensorFlow v1.x**: removed all TF-based components, removed TF mentions from documentation, default train class replaced with ```torch_trainer``` ([#1574](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1574)).
- **TensorFlow-based models were replaced with the PyTorch-based ones**, some models were renamed, various models and components were removed.
  - Replaced Models:
    - Entity Linking ([#1516](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1516))
    - Context Question Answering ([#1539](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1539))
    - NER ([#1545](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1545))
    - Classifier models ([#1565](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1565))
  - Removed Models
    - Classifiers, Doc Retrieval, Go-Bot, Neural Morphological Tagging, NER, ODQA, Ranking, Spelling Correction, Context Question Answering ([#1523](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1523))
    - ASR, TTS ([#1526](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1526))
    - ELMO ([#1533](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1533))
    - Chinese Context Question Answering ([#1534](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1534))
    - Ranking Models ([#1537](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1537))
    - Go-Bot ([#1544](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1544))
    - KBQA, Multitask BERT ([#1560](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1560))
    - Intent Catcher ([#1564](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1564))
    - Morpho/Syntax Models ([#1573](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1573))
  - Removed Components
    - Connectors to: Telegram, Microsoft Bot Framework, Amazon Alexa, Yandex Alice ([#1548](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1548))
    - Various components ([#1563](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1563))
- [Removed](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1540/commits/c8264bf82eaa3ed138395ab68f71d47a4175f2fc) serialization mechanism

# Major Features and Improvements
- **Python 3.8/3.9** support ([#1525](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1525)).
- Added nested configs overwriting mechanism ([#1561](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1561)).
- Added case-agnostic distil NER for DREAM ([#1570](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1570)).
- Added DeepPavlov Topics Classifier model ([#1584](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1584)).
- Added Russian SuperGLUE models ([#1577](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1577)).
- Added external metrics support ([#1546](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1546)).
- Added Jupyter Notebook support to documentation ([#1592](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1592)).

# Bug Fixes and Other Changes
- Requirements updated ([#1578](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1578)).
- Models deprecation mechanism ([#1547](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1547)).
- Uploaded DeepPavlov BERT models with MLM & NSP heads parameters ([#1502](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1502)).
- Fixed en_core_web_sm loading error ([#1524](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1524))
- Fixed NER models table view ([#1529](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1529))
- Removed special version of Transformers library for certain components ([#1532](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1532))
- Fixed tests ([#1543](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1543))
- Updated library output during model training ([#1572](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1572))
- Fixed ConnectionResetError handling in simple_download ([#1586](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1586))
- Minor fixes in KBQA models ([#1591](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1591))
- Added iterations count and speed output during training ([#1593](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1593))
- Fixed `datasets` version ([#1596](https://github.com/deeppavlov/DeepPavlov/pull/1596))

name: Release 0.17.6
body: - Changed links to group https://github.com/deeppavlov

name: Release 0.17.5
body: - fixed broken links from https://github.com/deepmipt to https://github.com/deeppavlovteam

name: Release 1.0.0rc1
body:
**Note**: DeepPavlov `1.0.0` is not released yet!

## DeepPavlov 1.0.0 Release Notes

- Added Python 3.8 and 3.9 support and library requirements are optimized in #1525 and #1578.
- Removed all TensorFlow components and default trainer replaced with `torch_trainer` in #1574.
- Added Russian SuperGLUE models and submission generation in #1577.
- Added NER case-agnostig config in #1570.
- Added external metrics support in #1546.
- Nested config overwriting mechanism in #1561.
- Refactoring of the training logging in #1572.
- KBQA models migrated to PyTorch in #1569.
- Classification models migrated to PyTorch in #1565.
- NER models migrated to PyTorch in #1545.
- Context question answering models migrated to PyTorch in #1539.
- Entity Linking migrated to PyTorch and reduced RAM and VRAM consumption in #1516.
- Added config deprecation mechanism in #1547.
- `torch_bert_ranker` now uses the same Hugging Face Transformers version as the rest of the components in #1532.
- Models and components removed in #1523, #1526, #1534, #1533, #1537, #1544, #1560, #1563, #1564, #1573.
- Fixed a problem with pre-trained BERT models by DeepPavlov in #1502. Resolves #1275 and #1390.
- Fixed en_core_web_sm load error during tests in #1524.
- Removed Telegram, MSBot Framework, Yandex Alice and Amazon Alexa connectors in #1548.
- Documentation updated in #1517, #1529.

name: Release 0.17.4
body: - fix `TypeError: Descriptors cannot not be created directly.` for Python 3.7.

name: Release 0.17.3
body: - fix `AttributeError module 'lib' has no attribute 'X509_V_FLAG_CB_ISSUER_CHECK`.

name: Release 1.0.0rc0
body:
### Renamed models:
When `a.json` is renamed to `b.json`, original `b.json` is removed.
- [squad_ru_torch_bert](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/0.17.1/deeppavlov/configs/squad/squad_ru_torch_bert.json) -> [squad_ru_bert](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/0.17.1/deeppavlov/configs/squad/squad_ru_bert.json)
- [ner_rus_bert_torch](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/0.17.1/deeppavlov/configs/ner/ner_rus_bert_torch.json) -> [ner_rus_bert](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/0.17.1/deeppavlov/configs/ner/ner_rus_bert.json)

- [base64_decode_bytesIO](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/08555428388fed3c7b036c0a82a70a25efcabcff/deeppavlov/models/nemo/common.py#L35)
- [bytesIO_encode_base64](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/08555428388fed3c7b036c0a82a70a25efcabcff/deeppavlov/models/nemo/common.py#L53)

- [nemo_tts](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/08555428388fed3c7b036c0a82a70a25efcabcff/deeppavlov/models/nemo/tts.py#L133)

### Other features:
- Python 3.8 and 3.9 support for non-tensorflow-based models
- [Upload DeepPavlov BERT models with MLM & NSP heads parameters](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/pull/1502/files)
- removed [examples](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/tree/0.17.1/examples) directory
- minor fixes and improvements

name: Release 0.17.2
body:
- Removed 12 configuration files and 5 components ([1498](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/pull/1498), [1499](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/pull/1499))
- SuperGLUE models [updated](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/pull/1508)

name: Release 0.17.1
body: - Pipeline building syntax using python is [simplified](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.17.1/apiref/core/common.html#deeppavlov.core.common.base.Model)

name: Release 0.17.0
body:
- A [relation extraction](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.17.0/features/models/re.html) model
- A [ReCoRD model](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/0.17.0/deeppavlov/configs/classifiers/superglue/superglue_record_roberta.json) is based on [Reading Comprehension with Commonsense Reasoning Dataset](https://sheng-z.github.io/ReCoRD-explorer/)

name: Release 0.16.0
body:
- A [distilled Russian BERT](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/pull/1465/files)
- New Pytorch-based [models](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/pull/1451) for classification, question answering and named entity recognition
- Removed some [configuration files and components](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/pull/1456)
- Small fixes and updates

name: Release 0.15.0
body:
- bert_as_summarizer, seq2seq_go_bot, hyperparameter optimization by neural evolution and all deeppavlov.deprecated components were removed
- [NER automodel](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.15.0/apiref/models/torch_bert.html#deeppavlov.models.torch_bert.torch_transformers_sequence_tagger.TorchTransformersSequenceTagger)
- Сomponent-based config requirements generation
- Minor edits and fixes

name: Release 0.14.1
body: - Fixed installation on python3.6

name: Release 0.14.0
body:
- [Intent Catcher](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.14.0/features/models/intent_catcher.html) component
- [Support](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.14.0/apiref/models/torch_bert.html?deeppavlov.models.torch_bert.torch_transformers_classifier.TorchTransformersClassifierModel#deeppavlov.models.torch_bert.torch_transformers_classifier.TorchTransformersClassifierModel) of the Hugginface Transformers for classification
- Go-Bot formfilling ([tutorial](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/0.14.0/examples/gobot_formfilling_tutorial.ipynb))
- Entity Linking, Wiki Parser and KBQA as [separate components](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.14.0/features/models/kbqa.html#advanced-using-entity-linking-and-wiki-parser-as-standalone-services-for-kbqa)
- Minor edits and fixes

name: Release 0.13.0
body:
- Hugging Face datasets [support](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/docs-preview/apiref/dataset_readers.html#deeppavlov.dataset_readers.huggingface_dataset_reader.HuggingFaceDatasetReader)
- Go-Bot now requires only RASA-based configs to train its components (intent catcher, slot filler, dialogue state tracker also known as Go-Bot itself)
- Prometheus [metrics middleware](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.13.0/integrations/rest_api.html#metrics) for REST web service
- KBQA models fixes
- Minor edits of the documentation

name: Release 0.12.1
body:
- Entity Linking for Wikidata (English)
- Bugfixes in KBQA model
- Other minor improvements

name: Release 0.12.0
body:
- [PyTorch Support](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/intro/choose_framework.html#text-classification-on-keras-or-pytorch) (w/ Examples)
- [Multi-task BERT](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/features/models/multitask_bert.html)
- Basic [RASA Configs Support](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/features/skills/go_bot.html#quick-start-rasa-dsls) for Go-Bot
- [Entity Linking](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/features/models/entity_linking.html)
- `top_n` Answers API Update in ODQA Models
- Hybrid NER Models Trained on OntoNotes: [Ru](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/dev/deeppavlov/configs/ner/ner_collection3_m1.json) | [En](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/dev/deeppavlov/configs/ner/ner_ontonotes_m1.json)
- [BoolQ](https://github.com/google-research-datasets/boolean-questions) Dataset [Reader](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/dev/deeppavlov/dataset_readers/boolqa_reader.py)

name: Release 0.11.0
body:
- Dataset generation tool with a [tutorial](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/0.11.0/deeppavlov/contrib/examples/Dataset_generation_tutorial.ipynb) for Goal-Oriented Dialog Bot
- Undocumented [feature](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/pull/1246) for downloading artifacts from Amazon s3
- [New KBQA pipeline](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/0.11.0/deeppavlov/configs/kbqa/kbqa_cq_online.json) for online version of Wikidata
- First version of a [KBQA pipeline](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/0.11.0/deeppavlov/configs/kbqa/kbqa_cq_rus.json) using Syntax tree for generating SPARQL-queries
- And many small improvements and fixes

name: Release 0.10.0
body:
- [New Knowledge Base Question Answering](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.10.0/features/models/kbqa.html) model for WikiData
- [Training interfaces](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.10.0/features/models/kbqa.html#train-models) for KBQA models
- Refactored [goal-oriented bot](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.10.0/features/skills/go_bot.html) architecture
- And many small improvements and fixes

name: Release 0.9.1
body: - Fix requirements for ASR and TTS configs

name: Release 0.9.0
body:
- A dataset reader for the [IMDB Large Movie Review Dataset](https://ai.stanford.edu/~amaas/data/sentiment/) and [sample configurations](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/0.9.0/deeppavlov/configs/classifiers/sentiment_imdb_conv_bert.json) for training classifiers on it
- [Models for speech recognition and synthesis](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.9.0/features/models/nemo.html) based on [NVIDIA NeMo](https://github.com/NVIDIA/NeMo)
- A New hybrid NER model pre-trained for [English](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/0.9.0/deeppavlov/configs/ner/conll2003_m1.json) and [Vietnamese](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/0.9.0/deeppavlov/configs/ner/vlsp2016_full.json) languages
- A pre-trained [NER-based Model for Sentence Boundary Detection Task](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.9.0/features/models/ner.html#ner-based-model-for-sentence-boundary-detection-task)
- Many smaller changes and fixes

name: Release 0.8.0
body:
- [Configuration and model for DRCD \(Chinese SQUAD\)](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.8.0/features/models/squad.html#drcd) based on Chinese BERT
- Remove all Keras usage in favor of `tensorflow.keras`
- Start refactoring of goal-oriented bot code
- Update dependencies versions
- Add a [BERT-embedding component](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.8.0/features/models/bert.html#bert-as-embedder) as a first step of moving from [google-research/bert](https://github.com/google-research/bert) to [HuggingFace's Transformers](https://github.com/huggingface/transformers)
- Release [BERT-based sentence embedders models](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.8.0/features/models/bert.html)
- Smaller changes and fixes

name: Release 0.7.1
body: - [BERT for Extractive Summarization](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.7.1/features/models/bert.html#bert-for-extractive-summarization)

name: Release 0.7.0
body:
- Replace Flask with FastAPI everywhere
- [A syntax parser model](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.7.0/features/models/syntaxparser.html)
- Deprecate Agent and Skill classes in favor of [DeepPavlov Agent](https://github.com/deepmipt/dp-agent)
- Change [DeepPavlov settings](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.7.0/integrations/settings.html) structure
- Code style fixes
- Many smaller changes and fixes

name: Release 0.6.1
body:
- New gobot tutorial
- Replace Flask with FastAPI for riseapi
- New section in quickstart documentation about out-of-the-box pretrained models
- Minor NER dataset reader fix
- Other minor documentation changes

name: Release 0.6.0
body:
* New [risesocket mode](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.6.0/integrations/socket_api.html)
* A [wrapper for Rasa skills](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.6.0/features/skills/rasa_skill.html)
* New [gobot tutorial](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/0.6.0/examples/gobot_tutorial.ipynb)
* Conversational Bert in Russian
* Minor fixes and documentation updates

name: Release 0.5.1
body:
- Downloads resuming after interruptions
- Small documentation tweaks
- [Multilingual SQUAD configuration](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/0.5.1/deeppavlov/configs/squad/squad_bert_multilingual_freezed_emb.json) for inference

name: Release 0.5.0
body:
- Conversational BERT model in English (trained on informal lexicon data)
- Updated requirements
- Python 3.7 support
- New DSL for building rule-based skills
- New SOTA insult-detection model based on the conversational BERT
- Updated documentation
- Refactored MorphoTagger classes to better conform DeepPavlov ideology
- Many smaller changes and fixes

name: Release 0.4.0
body:
* [New rule-based obscenity classifier for Russian language](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/0.4.0/deeppavlov/configs/classifiers/ru_obscenity_classifier.json)  
* [Lemmatization option in Morphotagger pipeline for Russian language](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/0.4.0/components/morphotagger.html#python)
* Unification of default configuration variables as per #844
* Fixes in knowledge base dataset readers
* other minor fixes

name: Release 0.3.1
body:
* Fixes in documentation
* Compressed BERT-based models
* Minor fixes

name: Release 0.3.0
body:
* Full spectrum of [BERT-based models](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/components/bert.html)
* [Multilingual BERT based NER](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/components/ner.html#ner-multi-bert) for 100 languages and 19 classes
* Pre-trained [BERT-base model for Russian](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/components/bert.html) Language
* Updated [rusentiment model](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/components/bert.html#bert-for-classification) trained on twitter
* New [AIML](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/skills/aiml_skill.html) wrapper component
* New [SMN, DAM, DAM-USE-T ranking models](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/intro/features.html#ranking-component)
* Minor fixes

name: Release 0.2.0
body:
* [Multilingual and English BERT-based models for classification and SQuAD](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/components/squad.html)
* [Knowledge base based Question Answering model](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/components/kbqa.html)
* [Refactor train script to class to simplify its modification and extension](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/apiref/core/trainers.html)
* [Super-convergence Keras model class]()
* +3 F1 for speller correction with new custom `vocab_penalty` property for `searcher_component` 
* Refactored similarity matching skill
* Add universal method `destroy` in `Component` class
* `--no-default-skill` optional flag if your component implements an interface of DeepPavlov skill 
* `--stateful` and `--multiinstance` flags for Amazon Alexa integration 
* Move `utils` module from project root into `deeppavlov` module
* Many minor improvements and bug fixes, including logging, ELMo save/load and many other

name: Release 0.1.6
body:
* [ODQA with scores: LogitRanker now returns a batch of best answers and their scores](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/apiref/models/doc_retrieval.html#deeppavlov.models.doc_retrieval.logit_ranker.LogitRanker)
* [Experimental similarity matching skill with updated tutorial](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/master/examples/tutorials/yandex_faq.ipynb)
* [Amazon EC2 deployment guide](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/devguides/aws_ec2.html)
* Links to `RuSentiment` dataset were removed due to legal issues
* Minor bug fixes

name: Release 0.1.5.1
body:
* Fix go_bot compatibility with the previous release
* [Extended support for env variables in configs](
http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/intro/config_description.html#variables)

name: Release 0.1.5
body:
* Out-of-the-box Amazon Alexa integration for any skill/model
* New popularity ranking for ODQA
* New fine-tuned models for paraphrase identification
* Support for learning rate & momentum schedulers

name: Release 0.1.1
body:
* Bug fixes and minor improvements
* New ELMO configs
* Manage some settings with `env` variables

name: Release 0.1.0
body:
* Variables in configs and improved python API
* Trainable ELMo model with TF Hub wrapper and support for large datasets
* "Few shot" NER model
* New ODQA model with support for "no answer" response
* Model for sentiment analysis in Russian with ELMo embeddings
* Pretrained model for classification Informational vs. Conversational questions on Yahoo dataset
* eCommerce bot with tfidf retrieve
* Improved logging, including dialog logging for Agents, docs and many other improvements and bug fixes
* Also check out our docker images for popular models on [hub.docker.com](https://hub.docker.com/u/deeppavlov/)

name: 0.1.0b
body: * Human readable logs

name: 0.1.0a
body:
* Dialog logging 
* API refactoring
* Settings files refactoring
* Other minor improvements and bug fixes

name: Release 0.0.9
body:
* Improved MorphoTagger now supports 10 languages
* Yandex.Alice integration for agents with many skills
* New SQUAD model that supports "no answer" token
* Universal wrapper for `sklearn` estimators and vectorizers
* New universal interface for metrics calculation
* Many other improvements and bug fixes

name: Release 0.0.8
body:
* Integration with Microsoft Bot Framework
* Integration with Yandex.Alice voice assistant
* Support Windows platform
* Upgrade to TensorFlow 1.10
* New features for parameters cross-validation
* New eCommerce Bot
* New Siamese networks for paraphrase identification and ranking
* Many other small improvements and bug fixes

name: Release 0.0.7
body:
* FAQ Skill for Russian & English with a tutorial
* Improved Seq2Seq GO Bot: attention over knowledge base, encoder attention, embeddings instead of one-hots
* Pretrainded model for Seq2Seq GO Bot on driver dataset with BLEU=13.2
* Improved ODQA model with squad logits:  f1 raised from 14 to 26
* Hashing tf-idf vectorizer component
* Text classifiers now compatible with ELMO embedder
* Improved documentation
* Bug fixes and minor improvements

name: Release 0.0.6.6
body:
* Fix bugs in [Morphological Tagging component](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/components/morphotagger.html)
* Other minor improvements

name: Release 0.0.6.5
body:
* New [documentation](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai)
* A new [ELMO component](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/apiref/models/embedders.html#deeppavlov.models.embedders.elmo_embedder.ELMoEmbedder)
* Improved [Morphological Tagging component](http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/components/morphotagger.html)
* CuDNN compatible layers for inference of NER and SQUAD components on CPU 
* Bug fixes and minor improvements

name: Release 0.0.6.1
body:
- New `show_examples` option for train and evaluate modes
- Bug fixes and minor improvements

name: Release 0.0.6b
body:
* [Tutorials](examples/tutorials)
* Do not import not used packages
* Per-config requirements
* Bug fixes and minor improvements

name: Release 0.0.6
body:
* Split requirements
* Add tutorials
* Support Tensorboard
* Add hyper-parameters evolution
* Some moves, renames and fixes

name: Release 0.0.5.3
body: * Bug fixes and minor improvements

name: Release 0.0.5.1
body: * Bug fixes and minor improvements

name: Release 0.0.5
body:
* New and blazingly fast spellchecker 
* State-of-the-art morphological tagger
* New models for sentiment analysis
* Update to TensorFlow 1.8
* Installation via `pip install deeppavlov`
* Many bug fixes and minor improvements

name: DeepPavlov 0.0.4 (pre-alpha)
body:
* Open Domain QnA skill for Russian & English
* SQuAD model for Russian
* Single unified model for NER and simple slot filler
* 10 new models for intent classification
* New component for GO bot connection to SQL database
* New event handler for training customisation
* New `predict` command
* Many bug fixes and minor improvements

name: DeepPavlov 0.0.3 (pre-alpha)
body:
* Seq2Seq goal-oriented bot skill
* Ranking model
* SQuAD model
* 20 classes NER model
* Multithreading version of `spacy_tokenizer` for huge datasets 
* Out of the box REST API for all models
* Simplified data handling for csv/json classification dataset
* Collection of commonly used layers for TF models
* Many bug fixes and minor improvements

name: DeepPavlov 0.0.2 (pre-alpha)
body:
* `chainer` for train/inference pipeline building instead of "Mother" model
* New abstractions: `Component`,  `Estimator`, `NNModel`
* New config structure
* Bug fixes and minor improvements

name: DeepPavlov 0.0.1 (pre-alpha)
body:
* JSON config
* "Mother" models
* TFModel and Keras model abstract classes
* Pre-trained speller
* Pre-trained NER / slot filler
* Pre-trained goal-oriented chatbot
* Pre-trained intent classifier
* Pre-trained embeddings for the Russian language
* Training and inferring from command line
* Telegram UI
